story:
ITA (ENG BELOW)

"New Focus": come nasce 

Ciao, sono Stefania Patanè, cantante e compositrice siciliana e ho la gioia di presentarvi New Focus, la mia nuova creazione discografica!

Il mio background è ricco di molteplici influenze musicali: dalla world music alla canzone d'autore, attraverso un legame inscindibile con il jazz e l'improvvisazione. Attraverso ritmi e sonorità in cui il mondo afroamericano si mescola con quello mediterraneo, New Focus è un turbinio di storie e stati d'animo che raccontano trasformazione, verità, resilienza, passione e libertà. Il siciliano è la lingua portante del disco, il cuore delle mie radici, che in alcuni brani si incontra con l'italiano, mia lingua madre e con l'inglese, idioma universale.

Accanto a me, un meraviglioso gruppo di musicisti, con cui abbiamo condiviso una coinvolgente esperienza musicale e umana: Il core del progetto, ovvero Seby Burgio e Francesco De Rubeis, e tre “special guest”, ovvero Kyungmi Lee, Enrico Bracco e Javier Girotto. Sono immensamente felice, per la magica coesione che si è creata fra di noi: adesso il mio desiderio più grande è quello di condividerla con voi!

 

Un crowdfunding per "New Focus" 

Dopo circa tre anni di gestazione, il progetto è diventato un album, ed è finalmente pronto per essere pubblicato in collaborazione con Orange Home Records: per sostenere la produzione e divulgazione di New Focus, chiediamo il vostro prezioso contributo!

Il ricavato di questa campagna di raccolta fondi servirà infatti a coprire una parte delle spese di produzione e le successive spese di promozione e di marketing, per un budget complessivo di 4000 euro. Qualora il budget venisse superato, questo aiuterebbe a realizzare un altro sogno, ovvero la produzione di video per i brani del disco: sarebbe meraviglioso! 

Visti i rapidi cambiamenti dell'industria discografica avvenuti negli ultimi anni, penso che il crowdfunding sia il modo ideale per agevolare la realizzazione e la promozione di un nuovo progetto musicale: ogni sostenitore col proprio contributo può farne parte, nel rispetto dell'autenticità dell'humus creativo originario.

Chiunque di voi ne abbia gioia, ci potrà sostenere grazie a questo crowdfunding. Qui di fianco potrete scegliere le varie ricompense ("perk" in inglese) “New Focus” pensate per ringraziarvi: cliccate sulla ricompensa che vi interessa per leggere la descrizione! 

 

Le ricompense“New Focus”

Riguardo le ricompense, si parte dalla possibilità di realizzare il download digitale del disco, e/o dalla spedizione del disco fisico (in entrambi i casi con booklet digitale), accompagnato da una mia dedica personale autografata, per poi passare attraverso tante altre possibili opzioni, tutte associate alla spedizione del CD: eccole!

- Stampa del dipinto “NEW FOCUS” DI MARCO VIRZÌ. Il quadro rappresenta il concetto dell'album: tutto può cambiare prospettiva, dando vita ad una nuova scintilla di creatività e generando l'amore nella sua forma più pura.  

 

- “FIORI DI PIETRE”. Nell'antica mitologia, l'Etna è protagonista di una amorevole storia di maternità: è per questo che chi è nato alle sue falde la sente donna e madre. Ho voluto rappresentare questa metafora a me cara attraverso le creazioni artigianali "Fiori di pietre" della catanese Vera La Rocca, che trasforma la pietra lavica in raffinati monili.​

 

C'è inoltre la possibilità di potere aggiungere all'ordine del nuovo album:

- una copia del mio precedente disco “EVEN NOT 4”

 

- varie RICOMPENSE MUSICALI INTERATTIVE, come: un meeting con me su skype o su zoom riguardante una lezione di canto o di songwriting, o una conversazione riguardo vari contenuti musicali a scelta (studio, composizione, performance, carriera, ecc.), fino ad una giornata in studio a Roma con Seby Burgio e me, al fine di realizzare l'arrangiamento e la registrazione di un brano, e all'organizzazione di un house concert di New Focus.

 

E' anche possibile donare una libera offerta, senza la scelta di una ricompensa (cliccando sul pulsante "back it" a destra del video in alto).

Inoltre tutti i nomi dei raisers (sostenitori) verranno inseriti tra i ringraziamenti nel booklet digitale!

Tutte le singole ricompense sono descritte in dettaglio qui di fianco a destra: cliccate su ognuna per scoprire cosa include! 

Infine, per chi di voi che avesse voglia di sostenerci, ma non avesse la possibilità di effettuare una donazione, ci sarete di grande aiuto diffondendo notizia di questa campagna il più possibile, attraverso il link di indiegogo!

 

GRAZIE: Senza di voi non sarebbe lo stesso :)

Io vi ringrazio di cuore, a nome mio e della band di New Focus! Il vostro supporto tramite questo crowdfunding farà per noi una grande differenza nella divulgazione di questo lavoro musicale che abbiamo tanto a cuore. Con il vostro contributo, New Focus potrà crescere ed essere sempre più condiviso: vi aspettiamo ai nostri prossimi concerti, per vivere e moltiplicare insieme le magiche emozioni che ci hanno portato fin qui.

 

Per saperne di più, seguitemi sulle mie pagine:

Facebook

Instagram

YouTube

 

ENG

"New Focus": the birth

Hi, my name is Stefania Patanè, I am a singer and composer from Sicily and I am joyful to present my new recording, entitled New Focus!

My musical background is made of various influences, going from world music to song writing, always maintaining a strong connection with jazz and improvisation. New Focus is a place where Afroamerican and mediterranean sounds and rhythms blend together, generating a crowd of emotions and stories that tell about transformation, truth, resilience, passion and freedom. The lyrics are mainly written in Sicilian language, that is the core of my roots. In some songs, the lyrics are written also in Italian, that is my native language and in English, that is an universal idiom.

Thanks to New Focus recording, I've shared an amazing human and musical experience with wonderful musicians. The core of the project: Seby Burgio and Francesco de Rubeis; and three special guests: Kyungmi Lee, Enrico Bracco and Javier Girotto. I am enormously grateful for the magic cohesiveness between all of us: now I wish to share it with you!


The crowdfunding

After three years of gestation, the project has finally become an album and it is going to be released in collaboration with Orange Home Records: we ask your precious contribution, to support and spread New Focus! 

With this campaign, I hope to reach the budget of 4000 euro, that will help to partially cover  the expenses of production and the marketing investments. If we surpass the goal, we will be able to product the videos for the songs of the new album: it would be amazing! 

Having considered how quickly the music industry has been changing in the last years, I think that crowdfunding is the best way to help the fulfillment and the spread of a new musical project: each raiser can be part of it, respecting the authenticity of the generating artistic humus.

If you would enjoy helping us, you can support us through this crowdfunding. You can choose the different “New Focus” perks that are listed here on the side, and that I invented to thank you: you can click on the perk that you like to see the description in details!

 

The “New Focus” perks

Basically, you can choose the digital download of the album and/or the shipping of the physical cd (in both cases with digital booklet), with my personal signed inscription. Furthermore, you can explore the other options, all including the CD shipping!

- A print of “NEW FOCUS” PAINTING BY MARCO VIRZÌ. The painting represents the concept of the album: we can always change point of view, giving life to a new spark of creativity and generating pure love.

 

- “FIORI DI PIETRE” (“FLOWERS OF STONE”). In ancient mythology, Etna Volcano is related to a story of maternity: this is why people from Catania feel it like female and mother. I have chosen some hand made creations by Vera La Rocca to represent this metaphor: Vera transforms the lava stone in fine jewelry.

 

Ordering the new album, you can also choose:  

- one copy of my previous cd “EVEN NOT 4”

 

- many MUSICAL PERKS: a skype/zoom meeting about voice lesson or songwriting lesson or a conversation about music, career, composition, etc., a day in a recording studio in Rome with Seby Burgio and me (arranging and recording a song), a house concert with the band.  

 

You can also choose to freely donate, without the order of any perk (click the "back it" button, on the right side of the video at the top of the page). 

All the names of the raisers will be in the digital booklet!

The details of all the perks are written here on the right side of this page: you can click on each one of them to discover all the things that are included!

Finally, if you would like but you can't contribute, you can be really helpful spreading the word and making noise about this campaign, using the indiegogo link!


THANK YOU: It wouldn't be the same without you :)

Me and the band are so grateful! Your support will make a big difference for us in our effort to spread “New Focus”. Your contribution will give us the possibility to make it growing and to share it more and more: we hope to see you at our next live concerts, to live and increase together all the magic emotions that have led us so far.

If you wan to know more about me, follow me on:

Facebook

Instagram

YouTube

 

Seby Burgio. 

Seby descrive New Focus con le sue parole! // Seby describes New Focus in his own words!

ITA (ENG subtitles).

 

Francesco de Rubeis.

Francesco descrive New Focus con le sue parole! ITA.

 

Francesco describes New Focus in his own words! ENG.

 

New Focus: le canzoni // the songs.

ITA / ENG.

 

Cuntala.

Un breve clip su "Cuntala", la terza traccia di New Focus, dedicata alla mia nonna materna e alla sua piccola primogenita. // A short clip about song "Cuntala", the third track of New Focus, dedicated to my grand mother and  her little daughter. ITA / ENG.

Il vostro supporto tramite questo crowdfunding farà per noi una grande differenza nella divulgazione di questo lavoro musicale che abbiamo tanto a cuore. Con il vostro contributo, New Focus potrà crescere ed essere sempre più condiviso: vi aspettiamo ai nostri prossimi concerti, per vivere e moltiplicare insieme le magiche emozioni che ci hanno portato fin qui. Per saperne di più, seguitemi sulle mie pagine:FacebookInstagramYouTube ENG"New Focus": the birthHi, my name is Stefania Patanè, I am a singer and composer from Sicily and I am joyful to present my new recording, entitled New Focus!My musical background is made of various influences, going from world music to song writing, always maintaining a strong connection with jazz and improvisation. New Focus is a place where Afroamerican and mediterranean sounds and rhythms blend together, generating a crowd of emotions and stories that tell about transformation, truth, resilience, passion and freedom. The lyrics are mainly written in Sicilian language, that is the core of my roots. In some songs, the lyrics are written also in Italian, that is my native language and in English, that is an universal idiom.Thanks to New Focus recording, I've shared an amazing human and musical experience with wonderful musicians. The core of the project: Seby Burgio and Francesco de Rubeis; and three special guests: Kyungmi Lee, Enrico Bracco and Javier Girotto. I am enormously grateful for the magic cohesiveness between all of us: now I wish to share it with you!
The crowdfundingAfter three years of gestation, the project has finally become an album and it is going to be released in collaboration with Orange Home Records: we ask your precious contribution, to support and spread New Focus! With this campaign, I hope to reach the budget of 4000 euro, that will help to partially cover  the expenses of production and the marketing investments. If we surpass the goal, we will be able to product the videos for the songs of the new album: it would be amazing! Having considered how quickly the music industry has been changing in the last years, I think that crowdfunding is the best way to help the fulfillment and the spread of a new musical project: each raiser can be part of it, respecting the authenticity of the generating artistic humus.If you would enjoy helping us, you can support us through this crowdfunding. You can choose the different “New Focus” perks that are listed here on the side, and that I invented to thank you: you can click on the perk that you like to see the description in details! The “New Focus” perksBasically, you can choose the digital download of the album and/or the shipping of the physical cd (in both cases with digital booklet), with my personal signed inscription. Furthermore, you can explore the other options, all including the CD shipping!- A print of “NEW FOCUS” PAINTING BY MARCO VIRZÌ. The painting represents the concept of the album: we can always change point of view, giving life to a new spark of creativity and generating pure love. - “FIORI DI PIETRE” (“FLOWERS OF STONE”). In ancient mythology, Etna Volcano is related to a story of maternity: this is why people from Catania feel it like female and mother. I have chosen some hand made creations by Vera La Rocca to represent this metaphor: Vera transforms the lava stone in fine jewelry. Ordering the new album, you can also choose:  - one copy of my previous cd “EVEN NOT 4” - many MUSICAL PERKS: a skype/zoom meeting about voice lesson or songwriting lesson or a conversation about music, career, composition, etc., a day in a recording studio in Rome with Seby Burgio and me (arranging and recording a song), a house concert with the band.   You can also choose to freely donate, without the order of any perk (click the "back it" button, on the right side of the video at the top of the page). All the names of the raisers will be in the digital booklet!The details of all the perks are written here on the right side of this page: you can click on each one of them to discover all the things that are included!Finally, if you would like but you can't contribute, you can be really helpful spreading the word and making noise about this campaign, using the indiegogo link!
THANK YOU: It wouldn't be the same without you :)Me and the band are so grateful! Your support will make a big difference for us in our effort to spread “New Focus”. Your contribution will give us the possibility to make it growing and to share it more and more: we hope to see you at our next live concerts, to live and increase together all the magic emotions that have led us so far.If you wan to know more about me, follow me on:FacebookInstagramYouTube Seby Burgio. Seby descrive New Focus con le sue parole! // Seby describes New Focus in his own words!ITA (ENG subtitles). Francesco de Rubeis.Francesco descrive New Focus con le sue parole! ITA. Francesco describes New Focus in his own words! ENG. New Focus: le canzoni // the songs.ITA / ENG. Cuntala.Un breve clip su "Cuntala", la terza traccia di New Focus, dedicata alla mia nonna materna e alla sua piccola primogenita. // A short clip about song "Cuntala", the third track of New Focus, dedicated to my grand mother and  her little daughter. ITA / ENG.

story:
Who we are

Hello everybody, we are Crystallion, a passionate metal band from Bavaria. We play melodic Power Metal with Hard Rock influences in the style of Iron Maiden / Helloween / Edguy etc.

Crystallion has been around for more than 15 years now, has released four albums already and is working on the fifth one to be released in June/July 2020. This upcoming album will be really special because last year we dared to switch the vocals from male to female. On top of that, two new guitarists complete our band now we are ready to go all in and hit the stages and your ears with ten great metal songs!

Get more info and music/live video samples on our website here: www.crystallion.org or on our facebook site: www.facebook.com/Crystallion.The.Bands.Page/ or on our instagram account: www.instagram.com/crystallion_official/ .

What We are looking for and what you’ll get in return

For providing you with the best possible sound we chose the Serious Black Studios in the south of Munich for recording. The sessions will start next month already and we are beyond excited! As professional work is expensive, we have to come up with at least 5.000.- Euros to pay for the recording, mixing and mastering services. With this crowdfunding campaign we are trying to raise 1000.- Euros, so none of us has to suffer from hunger, thirst or even sell our parents’ houses! :)  But even if we don't reach our goal, every cent you invest is appreciated!

So now it's up to you! Contribute to this matter of our hearts and make it happen. Together we can create something great!

Rewards

Of course we won't let you without rewards for your support:

1. € 25,-   signed CD

2. € 50,-  signed CD + credit in booklet

3. € 75,-   signed drumstick + signed CD + credit in booklet

4. € 75,-    drumhead signed (only 5 available/4 toms, 1 snare) + signed CD + credit in booklet

5 . € 75,-    guitar string set signed (only 8 available) + signed CD

6. € 85,-   one set of guitar strings, used on the recordings of the album signed plus certificate on which songs the set was used + signed CD + credit in booklet

7. € 100,- handwritten original lyric sheet (only 10 available!) These are the original pencil written scripts with all changes and rubs, each of them is unique! Choose your song! + Your name in the booklet of the album + a signed CD

free shipping

8. € 500,- Studio afternoon at the "Serious Black Studios" Munich, during the mix of the album (Travel costs to the studio in Munich not included) + signed CD + credit in booklet

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:
  • Get the word out and make some noise about Crystallion's new album!
  • Don't forget to share our campaign and use the Indiegogo share tools!

Thank you so much for your support, it means everything to us!

story:
Short Summary

Hi Friends! My name is Liam Searcy and I am a composer/performer who is currently a Musical Theatre major at Belmont University. I wrote a musical theatre song cycle titled Commitment that will be performed at 54 Below in New York on May 8th. Check it out right here:

https://54below.com/events/commitment-a-song-cy...

This will be my NYC debut as a performer and composer! This Song Cycle is a collection of stand alone story songs about a word we all have different definitions for. Commitment is found to be just as beautiful as it is dangerous.

Right now I am fundraising $5000 total (3,500 on here) to cover the artwork, sheet music, demos, plane tickets, musicians, Broadway talent and more. This is my chance to really put my heart on the stage in every way I know how. Thanks for being a part of it.

What We Need & What You Get

We are raising $5000. That will cover the amazing Broadway talent, the musicians, my producer, some plane tickets, and finalizing sheet music. Your funds will make the big concert happen without me having to go into debt! It will also reimburse some of the money I already spent getting artwork and a lot of sheet music several months ago. So thats what the funds will do for me ... what will they do for you?

PERKS!!!!!

The perks range from $10 to $500 so theres plenty of options. I must say the one I am most excited about is the sheet music collection, but go ahead and look through them all! I'd love to write you a song or do a house concert! 

 If You Can't Donate... Share!

A lot of what this concert will do for me is help me create a following of musical theatre lovers who want to watch and perform my work. Why not do that beforehand? If you wanna help out but are low on cash then share this and share my songs so people can hear my music! Thanks so much!

story:
** Für den deutschen Text bitte weiter unten schauen**

Welcome!

We are ChrisTala (Germany) and AyaM (Israel), a duo creating this Crowdfunding to connect with you and create a music album to awaken your soul.

'Shards Of Light' is the debut album by the musical duo TransForMusic :Ayam (Israel) and  ChrisTala (Germany).

Ensuing tales of darkness and light allows a deeper exploration of the human condition,
self-reflection, and self-realization of the human seeking soul.

The unique encounter of the ethnicity of Ayam's Jewish - Israeli
background, and ChrisTala German background, is blending the essence of
the traditional and emotional creating and contemporary inspiration.

Our music is inspired by ancient scriptures of universal wisdom interwoven with the philosophy of transfiguring the human experience by clarifying our wishes. To magnify the quality of your listening, we record it all at 432 Hz (natural frequency basic tone). In this way, you can feel powerful, healthy and transform your reality by changing your habits and be accompanied through your day. It’s like a modern mantra.

The fusion of Ayam's quirky, emotive, and full of narratives - yet the never-ending spectrum of colors - voice fused with ChrisTala's complementary groovy beatbox, overtone voices, and melodic compositions are reflecting a brutally honest portrait of an inner world where shadows and hope, sanity and insanity dance magically together; where mysteries are unveiled.

Listen and allow the sounds to awaken your soul, expand your heart and transform your mindset, and together change the world to a better place!

 

 

  • We compose original music that contains transformative texts and deep sounds to inspire your awakening to your true nature, as well as expanding your consciousness.
  • You will dive into a deep journey of understanding and reflecting on your own process of living in this reality as a human being.
  • Imagine that you have the power to change your own reality by choosing the atmosphere you want to create in your life. What would you like to invite into your life?
  • Choose to invite happiness, freedom, joy and abundance by listening to uplifting music. This is how we can become the change we desire to see in the world together.
  • You have the power to break down boundaries and overcome distances between people by supporting a project that is focused on creating unity through music, voice, dance and sound.
  • Join us and be part of our common vision to co-create a movement of change that aims to touch and open human hearts and minds worldwide as a global conscious community.

This Is Your Opportunity:

We live in a time that carries the potential of awakening into self-love, caring for one another and caring for the universe we live in. Help us to create awareness of these topics through our music. We are interdisciplinary artists, with the intention to bring more than just a few songs to this album - bringing insights, reflections of the human experience and messages about our development as a global conscious society.

Every song will contain a special message for a specific purpose or quality that we all wish to implement in our lives. It is a reminder for us all to look at the opportunities that life is giving to us - we are here on this planet for a reason: To find lightness through the darkness.

If you have questions please contact us here.

This Is Why We Create A Music Album For You:

Our album is a story being told. Get nourishment for your soul by listening to our music and Sound Journeys. Activate and cultivate this unity, inner peace and the positive change that is going to happen within you - in your own frequency spectrum!

By recording this album we are able to reach people worldwide and expand as a global conscious community. This music album will take you to a multicultural journey of unity in diversity, accepting and learning to love ourselves and one another. Thank you for helping us to spread this message worldwide, to expand human consciousness and bring attention and awareness to our highest potential.

You Will Be A Supporter For These Goals:

BASE GOAL: €10,000 will help us to cover 100% of the costs to record and release our music album of about 10 songs, do the promotion and build up a fanbase.

MIDDLE GOAL: €14.400 will cover 100% of album costs, Indiegogo fees, and will enable us to produce wonderful music videos and materials to give this music wings across the internet!

TOP GOAL:  €33,000 will support us to fund the follow-up 10 songs and our tour through Europe and even worldwide to support the global peaceful shift to unity with our presence and music!

Contribute Today And Claim The Perk Of Your Choice.

Or - how does this Crowdfunding thing work?

Do you simply want to pre-order the album and get it when it’s ready?

Or may we share our wonderful talents with you and meet personally in a singing circle, sound journey, dance journey, performance, lesson, workshops or concert?

  • Experience AyaM’s Body-Voice practice which will help you to unlock blockages in your body and find freedom and joy. Learn to listen to your body working with breath and to improvise with dance and voice.
  • Open your creativity and learn with ChrisTala to improvise melodies on Guitar, Flute, Bass, Multichord, Harmonium or percussions and take the chance to learn some groovy Beat Box or overtone singing.

>>>See all PERKS in the sidebar. Some can be claimed in limited amounts. Some are special offers. Claim your perk, pay online and we will deliver and join together.

Did you know? Our perks are perfect for beginners who are curious to delve into new forms of creativity. By providing individualized lessons in a safe supportive environment, you will have the chance to let go of any shyness or resistance that you may feel towards trying out something new :)

You are also able to combine any of the options listed in the PERKS to create an experience that suits your needs. We hope to inspire and share our passions with you!

If you have questions or simply don’t get along with the page, contact us here.

Please share this page with your buddies.

 

 

Website of TransForMusic  |  Facebook page  |  Youtube channel  |  Soundcloud Page

subscribe to our newsletter to get our story unfolded.

 

----- DEUTSCH -----

Herzlich willkommen!

Wir sind ChrisTala (Deutschland) und AyaM (Israel), ein Duo, das dieses Crowdfunding ins Leben gerufen hat, um mit Dir in Verbindung zu treten und unser Debütalbum zu finanzieren.

Mit kraftvollen Texten und einer Kombination aus schamanischen Beats und Reggae-Groove mit einem Jazz-Blues-Flavour, verwebt AyaMs fesselnd reine und gefühlvolle Stimme mit ChrisTalas grooviger Beat-Box, tiefen Obertönen und kompositorischer Kunst.

Unsere Musik ist inspiriert von alten Schriften der universellen Weisheit. Tauche ein in ein Erlebnis der Achtsamkeit und bewussten Handlungen.

Um die Qualität deines Hörerlebnisses zu erhöhen, nehmen wir alles bei 432 Hz auf. Die Frequenz- und Resonsnzforschung hat oft genug gezeigt, dass diese Grundfrequenz, auf die der Kammerton A eingestellt ist, uns Menschen und geordnete Materie generell positiv beeinflusst. Auf diese Weise können wir dir das Gefühl geben, kräftig und gesund zu sein und deine Realität zu verändern, indem wir dich mit underer Musik durch deinen Tag begleiten. Es ist wie ein modernes gutes Mantra. Und wir sind alle aus hochfrequenter schwingender Energie aufgebaut, die unseren Körper und unser System ausmacht, welche genauso auch von Musik und Klängen beeinflusst wird.

 

Lauscht unserer Musik und wir werden euch helfen, eure Seele zum Tanzen, euer Herz zum Singen und euren Geist in die Glückseeligkeit zu bringen und gemeinsam die Welt zu einem besseren Ort zu machen.

 

Das ist Musik für die tanzende Seele

  • Wir komponieren eigene Musik, die transformative Texte und tiefe Klänge enthält, um dein Erwachen zu deiner wahren Natur zu inspirieren und dein Bewusstsein zu erweitern.
  • Du wirst in eine tiefe Reise eintauchen, auf der deine eigenen Prozesse des Lebens in dieser Realität als Mensch verstehen und reflektieren kannst.
  • Stell dir vor, dass du die Macht hast, deine eigene Realität zu verändern, indem du die Realität wählst, die du in deinem Leben schaffen willst. Was würdest du gerne in dein Leben einladen?
  • Entscheide dich dafür, Glück, Freiheit, Freude und Fülle einzuladen, indem du erhebende Musik hörst. Auf diese Weise können wir gemeinsam zu der Veränderung werden, die wir in der Welt sehen wollen.
  • Du hast die Macht, Grenzen niederzureißen und Distanzen zwischen Menschen zu überwinden, indem du ein Projekt unterstützt, das darauf ausgerichtet ist, durch Musik, Stimme, Tanz und Klang Einheit zu schaffen.
  • Werde Teil unserer gemeinsamen Vision, eine Bewegung des Wandels mitzugestalten, die darauf abzielt, als eine globale bewusste Gemeinschaft die Herzen und Köpfe der Menschen weltweit zu berühren und zu öffnen.

Aus diesem Grund nehmen wir ein Musikalbum für dich auf:

Unser Album ist eine Geschichte, die wir erzählen. Hol dir Nahrung für deine Seele, indem du unsere einzigartige Musik und Klangreisen hörst. Aktiviere und kultiviere diese Einheit, den inneren Frieden und die positive Veränderung, die in dir geschehen wird - in deinem eigenen Frequenzspektrum!

Durch die Aufnahme dieses Albums sind wir in der Lage, Menschen weltweit zu erreichen und als globale bewusste Gemeinschaft zu expandieren. Dieses Musikalbum nimmt dich mit auf eine multikulturelle Reise der Einheit in der Vielfalt, des Akzeptierens und des Lernens, uns selbst und einander zu lieben. Danke, dass du uns hilfst, diese Botschaft weltweit zu verbreiten, das menschliche Bewusstsein zu erweitern und die Aufmerksamkeit und das Bewusstsein auf unser höchstes Potenzial zu lenken.

Du wirst ein Unterstützer für diese Ziele sein:

Grundziel: 10.000 € helfen uns dabei, 100% der Kosten für die Aufnahme und Veröffentlichung unseres Musikalbums mit etwa 10 Songs, die Promotion und den Aufbau einer Fangemeinde zu decken.

Mittelziel: 14.400 € decken 100% der Kosten des Albums und der Indiegogo-Gebühren und ermöglichen es uns, wunderbare Musikvideos und Materialien zu produzieren, um dieser Musik über das Internet Flügel zu verleihen!

TOP-Ziel: 33.000 € werden uns dabei unterstützen, die 10 Folgesongs und unsere Tournee durch Europa und sogar weltweit zu finanzieren, um den globalen friedlichen Übergang zur Einheit mit unserer Präsenz und unserer Musik zu unterstützen!

Leiste heute einen Beitrag und buche das Dankeschön (Perk) deiner Wahl.

Oder - wie funktioniert diese Crowdfunding-Sache?

Willst du einfach das Album vorbestellen und es bekommen, wenn es fertig ist?

Oder dürfen wir unsere wunderbaren Talente mit dir teilen und uns persönlich in einem Gesangskreis, einer Klangreise, einer Tanzreise, einer Aufführung, einer Unterrichtsstunde, einem Workshop oder einem Konzert treffen?

  • Erlebe die Body-Voice Praxis von AyaM, die dir helfen wird, Blockaden in deinem Körper zu lösen und Freiheit und Freude zu finden. Lerne, deinen Körper bei der Arbeit mit dem Atem zuzuhören und mit Tanz und Stimme zu improvisieren.
  • Öffne deine Kreativität und lerne mit ChrisTala, Melodien auf Gitarre, Flöte, Bass, Multichord, Harmonium oder Schlagzeug zu improvisieren. Nutze die Chance, eine groovige Beat Box oder Obertongesang zu lernen.

>>>Schau dir alle PERKS in der Seitenleiste an. Einige können in begrenztem Umfang gebucht werden. Einige sind Sonderangebote. Fordere dein PERK an, bezahle online und wir liefern und verbinden uns.

Wusstest du schon? Unsere Angebote sind perfekt für Anfänger, die neugierig darauf sind, sich in neue Formen der Kreativität zu vertiefen. Indem du individuellen Unterricht in einer sicheren, unterstützenden Umgebung bekommst, hast du die Möglichkeit, deine Schüchternheit oder Widerstände loszulassen, die du möglicherweise empfindest, wenn du etwas Neues ausprobierst :)

Du kannst auch die PERKS kombinieren, um eine Erfahrung zu schaffen, die deinen Bedürfnissen entspricht. Wir hoffen, dich zu inspirieren und unsere Leidenschaften mit dir zu teilen!

Wenn du Fragen hast oder einfach nicht mit der Seite zurechtkommst, kontaktiere uns hier.

Bitte teile diese Seite mit deinen Freunden und Bekannten.

Webseite von TransForMusic  |  Facebook Seite  |  Youtube Kanal  |  Soundcloud Seite

Melde dich auch zu unserem Newsletter an und sei Teil der Bewegung.

 

Biografie

 

ChrisTala

ist ein vielseitig begabter Musiker und Produzent von Klang-Instrumenten. Er spielt viele Instrumente, wie Schlagzeug, Percussion, Gitarre, Flöte, Harmonium und hat sich spezialisiert auf Rahmentrommel Percussion, Obertöne und intuitiven Gesang. Er koordiniert das ambitioniertes Projekt Klangraum Witzenhausen - Zentrum für Klangmassage, Gemeinschaft und die Kultur der Nächstenliebe, wo du kreatives Zusammenleben erleben, Klangbehandlungen lernen und Cacao Rituale oder Sing Kreise zelebrieren kannst. Er leiter weiterhin das Unternehmen SpiritSoundArt für Instrumentebau mit eigener Werkstatt, in der Menschen auch Instrumente selber bauen. Er ist ein herzlicher, sorgsamer, sanftmütiger Raumhalter, ist Anbieter von Klang-Heil-Reisen, Monochord- und Massagebehandlungen, Coach und vieles mehr.


AyaM

ist eine innere Reisende und erforscht heilsamen Tanz sowie Ausdruck durch Stimme und Töne und Unterricht für Gruppen und Einzel. Sie bietet in Berlin Kurse an für Anfänger und Profis an unter dem Titel DanSing Change. Sie hat viele Jahre Tanz studiert und ist mit vielen besonderen Kooperationen, Choreografen und Tänzern aktiv mit besondere Aufführungen im Feld des Improvisationstanzes und der spontanen Komposition. Ihr Solo "AyamWhatAyam" erregte 2019 Aufsehen.
Sie ist vielen Medizinlehrern gefolgt, hat Zeremonien unterstützt durch Gesang und Raumhalten. Dazu hat sie Kirtan Gesang, Tanz und Yoga studiert und arbeitet seit einiger Zeit mit schamanischem Trance Trommeln, Gesang, und Tanz – ihrem größten Lehrer.
Ihr Wunsch ist es, einen geschützten und heiligen Raum zu bieten und heilsamen Prozessen zu dienen mit ihrer Stimme, ihrer Fürsorge und Liebe. Besuche hier ihre Webseite.

 

Unsere Zusammenarbeit

begann 2018 direkt als wir uns kennenlernten. Seit dem haben wir verschiedene Performances ("SpaceWoven", "AyamWhatAyam"), Konzerte auf Festivals, Live Streams, Klangreisen, Workshops gegeben. Wir haben Kinder, sind sozial engagiert und freuen uns sehr auf ein wunderbares Leben.

To magnify the quality of your listening, we record it all at 432 Hz (natural frequency basic tone). In this way, you can feel powerful, healthy and transform your reality by changing your habits and be accompanied through your day. It’s like a modern mantra.The fusion of Ayam's quirky, emotive, and full of narratives - yet the never-ending spectrum of colors - voice fused with ChrisTala's complementary groovy beatbox, overtone voices, and melodic compositions are reflecting a brutally honest portrait of an inner world where shadows and hope, sanity and insanity dance magically together; where mysteries are unveiled.Listen and allow the sounds to awaken your soul, expand your heart and transform your mindset, and together change the world to a better place!  

We compose original music that contains transformative texts and deep sounds to inspire your awakening to your true nature, as well as expanding your consciousness.

You will dive into a deep journey of understanding and reflecting on your own process of living in this reality as a human being.

Imagine that you have the power to change your own reality by choosing the atmosphere you want to create in your life. What would you like to invite into your life?

Choose to invite happiness, freedom, joy and abundance by listening to uplifting music. This is how we can become the change we desire to see in the world together.


You have the power to break down boundaries and overcome distances between people by supporting a project that is focused on creating unity through music, voice, dance and sound.
Join us and be part of our common vision to co-create a movement of change that aims to touch and open human hearts and minds worldwide as a global conscious community.
This Is Your Opportunity:
We live in a time that carries the potential of awakening into self-love, caring for one another and caring for the universe we live in. Help us to create awareness of these topics through our music. We are interdisciplinary artists, with the intention to bring more than just a few songs to this album - bringing insights, reflections of the human experience and messages about our development as a global conscious society.Every song will contain a special message for a specific purpose or quality that we all wish to implement in our lives. It is a reminder for us all to look at the opportunities that life is giving to us - we are here on this planet for a reason: To find lightness through the darkness.If you have questions please contact us here.This Is Why We Create A Music Album For You:
Our album is a story being told. Get nourishment for your soul by listening to our music and Sound Journeys. Activate and cultivate this unity, inner peace and the positive change that is going to happen within you - in your own frequency spectrum!By recording this album we are able to reach people worldwide and expand as a global conscious community. This music album will take you to a multicultural journey of unity in diversity, accepting and learning to love ourselves and one another. Thank you for helping us to spread this message worldwide, to expand human consciousness and bring attention and awareness to our highest potential.You Will Be A Supporter For These Goals:BASE GOAL: €10,000 will help us to cover 100% of the costs to record and release our music album of about 10 songs, do the promotion and build up a fanbase.MIDDLE GOAL: €14.400 will cover 100% of album costs, Indiegogo fees, and will enable us to produce wonderful music videos and materials to give this music wings across the internet!TOP GOAL:  €33,000 will support us to fund the follow-up 10 songs and our tour through Europe and even worldwide to support the global peaceful shift to unity with our presence and music!Contribute Today And Claim The Perk Of Your Choice.Or - how does this Crowdfunding thing work?Do you simply want to pre-order the album and get it when it’s ready?Or may we share our wonderful talents with you and meet personally in a singing circle, sound journey, dance journey, performance, lesson, workshops or concert?
Experience AyaM’s Body-Voice practice which will help you to unlock blockages in your body and find freedom and joy. Learn to listen to your body working with breath and to improvise with dance and voice.
Open your creativity and learn with ChrisTala to improvise melodies on Guitar, Flute, Bass, Multichord, Harmonium or percussions and take the chance to learn some groovy Beat Box or overtone singing.
>>>See all PERKS in the sidebar. Some can be claimed in limited amounts. Some are special offers. Claim your perk, pay online and we will deliver and join together.Did you know? Our perks are perfect for beginners who are curious to delve into new forms of creativity. By providing individualized lessons in a safe supportive environment, you will have the chance to let go of any shyness or resistance that you may feel towards trying out something new :)You are also able to combine any of the options listed in the PERKS to create an experience that suits your needs. We hope to inspire and share our passions with you!If you have questions or simply don’t get along with the page, contact us here.Please share this page with your buddies.  Website of TransForMusic  |  Facebook page  |  Youtube channel  |  Soundcloud Pagesubscribe to our newsletter to get our story unfolded. ----- DEUTSCH -----Herzlich willkommen!Wir sind ChrisTala (Deutschland) und AyaM (Israel), ein Duo, das dieses Crowdfunding ins Leben gerufen hat, um mit Dir in Verbindung zu treten und unser Debütalbum zu finanzieren.Mit kraftvollen Texten und einer Kombination aus schamanischen Beats und Reggae-Groove mit einem Jazz-Blues-Flavour, verwebt AyaMs fesselnd reine und gefühlvolle Stimme mit ChrisTalas grooviger Beat-Box, tiefen Obertönen und kompositorischer Kunst.Unsere Musik ist inspiriert von alten Schriften der universellen Weisheit. Tauche ein in ein Erlebnis der Achtsamkeit und bewussten Handlungen.Um die Qualität deines Hörerlebnisses zu erhöhen, nehmen wir alles bei 432 Hz auf. Die Frequenz- und Resonsnzforschung hat oft genug gezeigt, dass diese Grundfrequenz, auf die der Kammerton A eingestellt ist, uns Menschen und geordnete Materie generell positiv beeinflusst. Auf diese Weise können wir dir das Gefühl geben, kräftig und gesund zu sein und deine Realität zu verändern, indem wir dich mit underer Musik durch deinen Tag begleiten. Es ist wie ein modernes gutes Mantra. Und wir sind alle aus hochfrequenter schwingender Energie aufgebaut, die unseren Körper und unser System ausmacht, welche genauso auch von Musik und Klängen beeinflusst wird. Lauscht unserer Musik und wir werden euch helfen, eure Seele zum Tanzen, euer Herz zum Singen und euren Geist in die Glückseeligkeit zu bringen und gemeinsam die Welt zu einem besseren Ort zu machen.  Das ist Musik für die tanzende Seele

Wir komponieren eigene Musik, die transformative Texte und tiefe Klänge enthält, um dein Erwachen zu deiner wahren Natur zu inspirieren und dein Bewusstsein zu erweitern.

Du wirst in eine tiefe Reise eintauchen, auf der deine eigenen Prozesse des Lebens in dieser Realität als Mensch verstehen und reflektieren kannst.

Stell dir vor, dass du die Macht hast, deine eigene Realität zu verändern, indem du die Realität wählst, die du in deinem Leben schaffen willst. Was würdest du gerne in dein Leben einladen?

Entscheide dich dafür, Glück, Freiheit, Freude und Fülle einzuladen, indem du erhebende Musik hörst. Auf diese Weise können wir gemeinsam zu der Veränderung werden, die wir in der Welt sehen wollen.

Du hast die Macht, Grenzen niederzureißen und Distanzen zwischen Menschen zu überwinden, indem du ein Projekt unterstützt, das darauf ausgerichtet ist, durch Musik, Stimme, Tanz und Klang Einheit zu schaffen.

Werde Teil unserer gemeinsamen Vision, eine Bewegung des Wandels mitzugestalten, die darauf abzielt, als eine globale bewusste Gemeinschaft die Herzen und Köpfe der Menschen weltweit zu berühren und zu öffnen.
Aus diesem Grund nehmen wir ein Musikalbum für dich auf:Unser Album ist eine Geschichte, die wir erzählen. Hol dir Nahrung für deine Seele, indem du unsere einzigartige Musik und Klangreisen hörst. Aktiviere und kultiviere diese Einheit, den inneren Frieden und die positive Veränderung, die in dir geschehen wird - in deinem eigenen Frequenzspektrum!Durch die Aufnahme dieses Albums sind wir in der Lage, Menschen weltweit zu erreichen und als globale bewusste Gemeinschaft zu expandieren. Dieses Musikalbum nimmt dich mit auf eine multikulturelle Reise der Einheit in der Vielfalt, des Akzeptierens und des Lernens, uns selbst und einander zu lieben. Danke, dass du uns hilfst, diese Botschaft weltweit zu verbreiten, das menschliche Bewusstsein zu erweitern und die Aufmerksamkeit und das Bewusstsein auf unser höchstes Potenzial zu lenken.Du wirst ein Unterstützer für diese Ziele sein:Grundziel: 10.000 € helfen uns dabei, 100% der Kosten für die Aufnahme und Veröffentlichung unseres Musikalbums mit etwa 10 Songs, die Promotion und den Aufbau einer Fangemeinde zu decken.Mittelziel: 14.400 € decken 100% der Kosten des Albums und der Indiegogo-Gebühren und ermöglichen es uns, wunderbare Musikvideos und Materialien zu produzieren, um dieser Musik über das Internet Flügel zu verleihen!TOP-Ziel: 33.000 € werden uns dabei unterstützen, die 10 Folgesongs und unsere Tournee durch Europa und sogar weltweit zu finanzieren, um den globalen friedlichen Übergang zur Einheit mit unserer Präsenz und unserer Musik zu unterstützen!Leiste heute einen Beitrag und buche das Dankeschön (Perk) deiner Wahl.Oder - wie funktioniert diese Crowdfunding-Sache?Willst du einfach das Album vorbestellen und es bekommen, wenn es fertig ist?Oder dürfen wir unsere wunderbaren Talente mit dir teilen und uns persönlich in einem Gesangskreis, einer Klangreise, einer Tanzreise, einer Aufführung, einer Unterrichtsstunde, einem Workshop oder einem Konzert treffen?

Erlebe die Body-Voice Praxis von AyaM, die dir helfen wird, Blockaden in deinem Körper zu lösen und Freiheit und Freude zu finden. Lerne, deinen Körper bei der Arbeit mit dem Atem zuzuhören und mit Tanz und Stimme zu improvisieren.

Öffne deine Kreativität und lerne mit ChrisTala, Melodien auf Gitarre, Flöte, Bass, Multichord, Harmonium oder Schlagzeug zu improvisieren. Nutze die Chance, eine groovige Beat Box oder Obertongesang zu lernen.
>>>Schau dir alle PERKS in der Seitenleiste an. Einige können in begrenztem Umfang gebucht werden. Einige sind Sonderangebote. Fordere dein PERK an, bezahle online und wir liefern und verbinden uns.Wusstest du schon? Unsere Angebote sind perfekt für Anfänger, die neugierig darauf sind, sich in neue Formen der Kreativität zu vertiefen. Indem du individuellen Unterricht in einer sicheren, unterstützenden Umgebung bekommst, hast du die Möglichkeit, deine Schüchternheit oder Widerstände loszulassen, die du möglicherweise empfindest, wenn du etwas Neues ausprobierst :)Du kannst auch die PERKS kombinieren, um eine Erfahrung zu schaffen, die deinen Bedürfnissen entspricht. Wir hoffen, dich zu inspirieren und unsere Leidenschaften mit dir zu teilen!Wenn du Fragen hast oder einfach nicht mit der Seite zurechtkommst, kontaktiere uns hier.Bitte teile diese Seite mit deinen Freunden und Bekannten.Webseite von TransForMusic  |  Facebook Seite  |  Youtube Kanal  |  Soundcloud SeiteMelde dich auch zu unserem Newsletter an und sei Teil der Bewegung. Biografie ChrisTalaist ein vielseitig begabter Musiker und Produzent von Klang-Instrumenten. Er spielt viele Instrumente, wie Schlagzeug, Percussion, Gitarre, Flöte, Harmonium und hat sich spezialisiert auf Rahmentrommel Percussion, Obertöne und intuitiven Gesang. Er koordiniert das ambitioniertes Projekt Klangraum Witzenhausen - Zentrum für Klangmassage, Gemeinschaft und die Kultur der Nächstenliebe, wo du kreatives Zusammenleben erleben, Klangbehandlungen lernen und Cacao Rituale oder Sing Kreise zelebrieren kannst. Er leiter weiterhin das Unternehmen SpiritSoundArt für Instrumentebau mit eigener Werkstatt, in der Menschen auch Instrumente selber bauen. Er ist ein herzlicher, sorgsamer, sanftmütiger Raumhalter, ist Anbieter von Klang-Heil-Reisen, Monochord- und Massagebehandlungen, Coach und vieles mehr.
AyaM
ist eine innere Reisende und erforscht heilsamen Tanz sowie Ausdruck durch Stimme und Töne und Unterricht für Gruppen und Einzel. Sie bietet in Berlin Kurse an für Anfänger und Profis an unter dem Titel DanSing Change. Sie hat viele Jahre Tanz studiert und ist mit vielen besonderen Kooperationen, Choreografen und Tänzern aktiv mit besondere Aufführungen im Feld des Improvisationstanzes und der spontanen Komposition. Ihr Solo "AyamWhatAyam" erregte 2019 Aufsehen.Sie ist vielen Medizinlehrern gefolgt, hat Zeremonien unterstützt durch Gesang und Raumhalten. Dazu hat sie Kirtan Gesang, Tanz und Yoga studiert und arbeitet seit einiger Zeit mit schamanischem Trance Trommeln, Gesang, und Tanz – ihrem größten Lehrer.Ihr Wunsch ist es, einen geschützten und heiligen Raum zu bieten und heilsamen Prozessen zu dienen mit ihrer Stimme, ihrer Fürsorge und Liebe. Besuche hier ihre Webseite. Unsere Zusammenarbeitbegann 2018 direkt als wir uns kennenlernten. Seit dem haben wir verschiedene Performances ("SpaceWoven", "AyamWhatAyam"), Konzerte auf Festivals, Live Streams, Klangreisen, Workshops gegeben. Wir haben Kinder, sind sozial engagiert und freuen uns sehr auf ein wunderbares Leben.

story:
Short Summary

Music, Live!, Outdoors, Friends, those are just some things that people have had to do without since March. The Quarentet is aiming to change that, you've seen our weekly videos featuring performers from all over the U.S. 

Now The Quarentet plans to bring those performers together and put on a Live stream show in Mason, MI. 

Join us via Facebook, Instagram, Youtube and Twitch for our inaugural LiveStream concert on August 1st, 2020. 

What We Need & What You Get

In order to have this concert happen and get the music to the people we are going to need your help!

We have calculated that we will need $1200 for this concert to take place. Your contribution towards this goal will help us accomplish the following.

  • Goal 1 - Pay for three musicians travel ($450)
  • Goal 2 - Pay for 2 Singers travel ($350)
  • Goal 3 - Pay for social media and recording equipment use and rental ($400)

The Impact

People like ourselves who are in the performing arts have been out of work since March, we are hoping to bring back live music and help support the growth of our industry as we need to adapt to these new times. 

Risks & Challenges

The most challenging part is hopefully coming to an end. We as a group adapted and was created out of the need for social distancing. We hope to continue to create and provide higher quality content for our viewers.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that these are hard times for everyone and people simply cannot afford to donate. But thats ok if you cant donate all we ask is for you to share our videos with a friend. Likes and subscribes can help us to continue creating this content weekly.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=udiDnMBiJlM

story:
The pandemic has had a severe impact on nearly every small business and the JamPAD has been no exception. So while it feels selfish to ask for financial assistance when so many of us are suffering, I feel compelled to attempt to appeal to the generosity of friends and well-wishers. 

Before the pandemic hit, my lunchtime and after-school programs were thriving with nearly 70 regular weekly attendees. This includes 25 students that attended with the scholarship funding we raised last December, as well as regular guest musicians and staff. I was also running epic jams with West Toronto Keys to inclusion and a high school developmental disability program, as well as private lessons with my longtime clients. 

Being unable to work in my previous place of residence for most of the located, I recently relocated my studio to a house that's much safer to work out of during the current stage of the pandemic. I have my own entrance to a well-ventilated basement studio, as well as access to a backyard and large garage that will enable me to safely teach small groups at a distance for the foreseeable future.

It will certainly take time to rebuild operations to the point they were last March, but with your assistance I can keep things steady and maintain affordable services for my long-time students.

I truly believe that JamPAD provides meaningful music experiences to people of all ages and abilities. Please consider supporting music education for all!

story:
Hi. My name is Alison and I make music as Nosila. I marry my passion for producing and songwriting with a desire to make meaningful music and empower other women.

This summer I will release my very first EP, "Of Course I Still Love You," a project that chronicles the complexities of addiction. 

 

Budget

Though I plan on DIY-ing much of this project, I still need outside help:

  • Mixing and Co-Producing: $1,000
    • Even though self-producing will defray much of the cost for the EP, it's important I hire a team to help augment my vision.
  • Plugins and Gear: $1,000
    • I'd like to upgrade a few pieces of equipment and expand my sound library. Investing in upgrades will benefit this EP as well as other projects. (See stretch goal!)
  • Design Work: $500
    • Hiring a graphic designer will help streamline my visual content and marketing.
  • Mastering: $500
    • Mastering is the final touch in the recording process and makes everything sound polished.
  • Video: $1,000
    • A well-made video will help me tell a story that introduces my music to new people. 
  • Marketing: $1,000
    • As much as I wish it weren't true, music doesn't just find an audience by accident. Even really great music needs a little help getting out there! 
  • Stretch Goal: $2,000
    • Though related to this EP, my stretch goal has more to do more with my long term goals. One of my dreams is to open a studio where I can teach, produce, and more specifically, create safe space for women to learn and record. If I am able to reach this goal, I could rent and build out a small studio space.

Total: $5,000

Stretch Goal Total: $7,000

If I'm unable to raise the full budget, I may be able to cut the video and some of the promotional budget. At the very least, I'd like to raise $3,500.

That being said, I plan on working for every penny! The rewards in the sidebar present you with opportunities to interact with the project on a personal level. In some cases, you will even have the opportunity to be part of the music itself!

 

Impact

Like I mentioned above, this EP is about a tender topic. My hope is that by shedding light on the complexities of addiction, I'm able to tell important stories that help us be more understanding human beings.

I also hope to inspire other women on my production journey. I never would have tried producing if it hadn't been for the female producer at that workshop. I hope to be her for someone else. 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Not everyone can financially support their own dreams, let alone someone else's! I get it! Here are some other ways you can help:

  • Post the link to this campaign online; facebook, instagram, myspace, xanga, all of it. 
  • Tag me (@nosilamusic) on socials and tell people to click the link in my bio. 
  • Tell your mom, grandma, dog, cousin, or boss that they should support this really cool artist you know.

And that's all there is to it.

Thanks so much for your love and support. You are so appreciated.

story:
Short Summary


Hi there. My name is Drew Silverman, a composer and interdisciplinary artist in Austin, TX. A team of talented creators and I are putting on a unique show this April in Austin called Gorintō. It is an intimate new music multi-sensory evening length composition and visual event that is part soundscape, part classicist composition, part sound bath and part ASMR dream.

 Gorintō is the first evening length event that I have been fully in charge of producing, directing and composing, and I am exceedingly proud of it. It’s a meaningful culmination of my work in music, composition, and general pursuits of knowledge, as well as a collaboration with four critically acclaimed, talented sound artists.

Your contribution will help make this unique event more robust and enveloping. Helping to create a deeply immersive piece that you can get lost in for an hour. 


-------------------------------------
Silverman has been heavily involved in composition for the last 10 years, and worked most extensively composing for the performing arts. Working closely with companies and choreographers such as Alyson Dolan (ATX), Sarasota Contemporary Dance Company (FLA) and Kathy Dunn Hamrick Dance Company (ATX), he has composed for several evening length dance works. KDH Dance Company's fall work entitled "Be Still, My Heart" was named one of Austin Chronicle's "Top 10 Dance and Classical Music Joys of 2018", and he was Nominated for Best Sound Design by the Austin Critic's Table for his 2018 composition "A Meditation" for choreographer Alyson Dolan.
-------------------------------------

 

About Gorintō


Gorintō is unique in it's conception in that, unlike most musical events, the audience is not only a spectator, the audience is an experiential being. The aim of Gorintō is to make you feel like a part of a larger organism, not separate from. Like the bacteria in your stomach, or the planets in the solar system, large or small, all a part of an ever expanding system of forms informing each other's existence, incidentally and profoundly.

The set up will be in the inverted round. Audience will gather in the center of the space and are invited to lie down on a raised and padded floor covered with a range of comfort items. Audiences are encouraged to bring their own favorite comfort items as well to experience a series of projections on the ceiling of the space. Audiences will be surrounded by 5 sound artists, somewhat obscured and raised, with their performance syphoned to their ears through a quadrophonic sound system (4 speakers with separate outputs, allowing a more nuanced and spacious mixing image). The piece is narrative in scope, but abstract in practice, leaving room for the audience to glean their own experiential conclusions and feelings.


What We Need 


Because Gorintō is set up unlike most musical events, it requires a much more involved  production, much more gear, and to treat the venue more like a raw space than one with facilities readily available to house this experience. Due to this, we need funds to transform Ground Floor Theater into a wholly different, cocoon of an art space, and we need your help to do it!

An additional important element of this piece is it’s intimacy, with only enough room for 35-40 guests each performance, we want each person to have ample room to lie down, bundle up, and get comfortable in the raised and padded floor. Because of this intimacy, and our attempt to keep ticket prices manageable and inclusive, any help from you would make our pursuits much more comfortable for us as well!

Everyone involved is fully intent on making this show happen no matter what, so we will use whatever funds we can raise to help support producing this show, and GREATLY appreciate anyone who helps and believes in this projects as much as the people involved do. Your funds will help pay for the sound artists, the visual and audio design team and for the transformation of the space into a cocoon for a roughly hour long piece.

This campaign is really more about a process than a product, so we're not offering any specific physical perks for contributing, but asking for support for the project if you are able to and believe in it enough to want to contribute. I will absolutely be writing a personal thank you to everyone who contributes, and other tiers will be thanked in the program additionally. 

Everyone needs time to breathe, reflect, receive, and connect. Gorintō endeavors to provide an opportunity to indulge in that truth. To allow you to engage in this microcosm and nothing else, and to be fully present, whether that means in yourself, in environment, or within each other. 
 

よろしきお願いします！THANK YOU IN ADVANCE!

Even if you are not able to support us financially in this pursuit, please share with others that you know who may be interested and able to! You can copy this link and paste it into any social media platform or e-mail, or more simply, use the myriad social media tools that Indiegogo provides!

​

Short SummaryHi there. My name is Drew Silverman, a composer and interdisciplinary artist in Austin, TX. A team of talented creators and I are putting on a unique show this April in Austin called Gorintō. It is an intimate new music multi-sensory evening length composition and visual event that is part soundscape, part classicist composition, part sound bath and part ASMR dream. Gorintō is the first evening length event that I have been fully in charge of producing, directing and composing, and I am exceedingly proud of it. It’s a meaningful culmination of my work in music, composition, and general pursuits of knowledge, as well as a collaboration with four critically acclaimed, talented sound artists.Your contribution will help make this unique event more robust and enveloping. Helping to create a deeply immersive piece that you can get lost in for an hour. -------------------------------------Silverman has been heavily involved in composition for the last 10 years, and worked most extensively composing for the performing arts. Working closely with companies and choreographers such as Alyson Dolan (ATX), Sarasota Contemporary Dance Company (FLA) and Kathy Dunn Hamrick Dance Company (ATX), he has composed for several evening length dance works. KDH Dance Company's fall work entitled "Be Still, My Heart" was named one of Austin Chronicle's "Top 10 Dance and Classical Music Joys of 2018", and he was Nominated for Best Sound Design by the Austin Critic's Table for his 2018 composition "A Meditation" for choreographer Alyson Dolan.------------------------------------- About Gorintō
Gorintō is unique in it's conception in that, unlike most musical events, the audience is not only a spectator, the audience is an experiential being. The aim of Gorintō is to make you feel like a part of a larger organism, not separate from. Like the bacteria in your stomach, or the planets in the solar system, large or small, all a part of an ever expanding system of forms informing each other's existence, incidentally and profoundly.The set up will be in the inverted round. Audience will gather in the center of the space and are invited to lie down on a raised and padded floor covered with a range of comfort items. Audiences are encouraged to bring their own favorite comfort items as well to experience a series of projections on the ceiling of the space. Audiences will be surrounded by 5 sound artists, somewhat obscured and raised, with their performance syphoned to their ears through a quadrophonic sound system (4 speakers with separate outputs, allowing a more nuanced and spacious mixing image). The piece is narrative in scope, but abstract in practice, leaving room for the audience to glean their own experiential conclusions and feelings.
What We Need Because Gorintō is set up unlike most musical events, it requires a much more involved  production, much more gear, and to treat the venue more like a raw space than one with facilities readily available to house this experience. Due to this, we need funds to transform Ground Floor Theater into a wholly different, cocoon of an art space, and we need your help to do it!An additional important element of this piece is it’s intimacy, with only enough room for 35-40 guests each performance, we want each person to have ample room to lie down, bundle up, and get comfortable in the raised and padded floor. Because of this intimacy, and our attempt to keep ticket prices manageable and inclusive, any help from you would make our pursuits much more comfortable for us as well!Everyone involved is fully intent on making this show happen no matter what, so we will use whatever funds we can raise to help support producing this show, and GREATLY appreciate anyone who helps and believes in this projects as much as the people involved do. Your funds will help pay for the sound artists, the visual and audio design team and for the transformation of the space into a cocoon for a roughly hour long piece.This campaign is really more about a process than a product, so we're not offering any specific physical perks for contributing, but asking for support for the project if you are able to and believe in it enough to want to contribute. I will absolutely be writing a personal thank you to everyone who contributes, and other tiers will be thanked in the program additionally. Everyone needs time to breathe, reflect, receive, and connect. Gorintō endeavors to provide an opportunity to indulge in that truth. To allow you to engage in this microcosm and nothing else, and to be fully present, whether that means in yourself, in environment, or within each other.  よろしきお願いします！THANK YOU IN ADVANCE!Even if you are not able to support us financially in this pursuit, please share with others that you know who may be interested and able to! You can copy this link and paste it into any social media platform or e-mail, or more simply, use the myriad social media tools that Indiegogo provides!​

story:
Impact

This is a chance to help back a truly "once in a lifetime" album and documentary project that might change our family's life. We are Gonora Sounds, a family band made up of father Daniel Gonora (Guitar) and sons, Isaac Gonora (Drums), Promise Gonora (Bass) and sometimes Proud Gonora on drumming duties. If we could only get Danny Gonora Jr to sing, then we did be like the Jackson Five. Until then we will stay as Gonora Sounds.

story:
Short Summary

I am a songwriter. My passion is telling women's stories - my last album, 2015's North East Rising Sun, climbed to the Top 10 on the Folk Music charts, thanks in large part to my wonderful executive producer, Kari Estrin. 

When I was young, I worked with Bobby Darin and Chappell Music, but now I'm a solo artist in my own right. I'm building up a team of legacy-creating women such as Kari Estrin and Louisa Branscomb, who have broken glass ceilings. I'm adding young, dynamic videographers and online marketing professionals who hear how my music crosses generations. And, I'm inviting you!

The music business has changed since I first started.  But, I wake up every morning grateful for the people I meet along my journey, and am adapting in order to bring you new music. So, what do you say? Will you help?

 

What We Need & What You Get

We aim to release In My Pocket at the end of May 2019. As you saw in the campaign video and can glean from our expense breakdown below, The album is almost complete, we need your help putting the finishing touches on the recordings, and getting all the pieces in place to make sure this album reaches the greatest number of people possible. 

Our total fundraising goal is $8,000.

Here is the expense breakdown:

Indiegogo Platform Fees: $375 - they take 5%

Mixing & Mastering: $1,500

Publicity & Marketing: $2,000

Radio Promo: $4,000

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Share the campaign link with your friends and family!

Come see me on tour this summer!

Support women in music!

 

Blessings, 

- Brooksie

story:
Lyrics

Close your eyes and dream of impossible things

Let Love surprise your heart and mind and take you to where you’ve never been

Draw a map, believe in unforeseeable ends

Let your compass turn so you’re forced to learn as you ride upon the wind

 

Close your eyes and remember who you are

Take off into the bluest skies

There’s a moment in time when you’re not that far

There’s a dream and it’s pulling at your heart

Take of into the truest light

There’s a moment in time when you’re not that far

The Plan

We are hoping to raise $2000 by the end of July! That means we only have ONE MONTH to reach our goal!!

We are planning to film this video in early August over one weekend in New York City with a small crew. We could use your help to bring the filmmakers to NYC and for production costs. The video and with an updated recording will premiere sometime this fall.

Letter From the Songwriter

This piece of music has been my heart’s song from before I even wrote it down and has taught me so much about myself. When I feel a wave of anxiety or when I feel like my brain and my life is out of control, I remember the voice in my heart that tells me to “Close my eyes and dream of impossible things.” When I am in the midst of depression or whatever is keeping me from living freely, it seems impossible to surface. In that moment I close my eyes, let go, and let love take me to a place where I can overcome fear.

Struggling with depression makes it hard for me to focus on making my own art. This piece of art came from me, it is the most beautiful thing I have shared with myself and I want to give it another voice. This began with a pen and paper, came to life when my brother put it to music, showed itself in a series of drawings I created, and now it wants to be a music video. I want to share this heart song with more people, exploring unforeseeable ends.

May you learn to love with each new sunrise,

Meeka

Letter from the Director

Meeka and I have been friends for over 5 years and ever since we became friends, we have always loved collaborating on our art. When she approached me about directing this video I said yes without hesitation. After graduating from film school last year I found it very difficult to find time or inspiration to be creative. Recently I have struggled with wanting to create more and being unable to do so.

Having the opportunity to shoot this music video will fill both of our needs to create and collaborate. We hope that you are inspired by this piece of music like we are and are willing to show us support as we get to live our dreams and hopefully further our careers as artists. 

Thank you for your support,

Kelly

What We Need

If we reach our goal we will be able to produce a high quality video with some high quality people. If we come short, we will use the equipment we have and do the best we can with that. So far these are our expenses.

Travel Expenses for Crew Members

Equipment Rentals

Transportation Throughout the City

Food for our Crew

Wardrobe/Production Design Costs

Possible Permits and Licenses 

Break it down for folks in more detail:

What You Get

We have some awesome perks for you if you decide to donate to this amazing project!

$10 - A Personal 'Thank You' Email from the creators!

$25 - Personal 'Thank You' Email + Social Media Shoutout!

$50 - You'll get your name in the credits!

$100 - Your name in the credits + A signed print of 'Impossible Things' Art created by Meeka!

$500 - Early Access to the Video + Name in Credits + Signed Impossible Things Art + Exclusive Behind the Scenes footage from the set!!

These are some awesome perks that we really hope you take advantage of!

Risks & Challenges

Since Meeka is the only person on the team who is located in NYC, our biggest need is to get the rest of our crew to New York. Without a crew, we can’t make the film.  We also face possible permit costs and rental costs associated with filming in New York City. Help us make art!!!

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are unable to help us meet our financial goal, we ask that you consider spreading the word via social media! Tell your friends!

Questions?

If you have any questions about this project, our crew, or other ways to get involved, please message us!
